Description: Redware pottery dish with a shallow foot, convex sides widening to the asymmetrical everted rim(incomplete), the interior is inscribed in black paint with Hieratic script and decorated with a representation of Osiris and Ra(?) in a barque(very faint).
Bibliographic references: Vleeming 2015 / Demotic graffiti and other short texts gathered from many publications (no.2251, p.451)
